/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. A white car is parked on the left side of the street, adding a touch of modernity to the scene. On the right side of the street, a yellow building stands out, its vibrant color contrasting with the surrounding structures. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, completing the picturesque view of this worldwide landmark.
